Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue trains bypassing UIC Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC Halsted due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
